Thule Sucks

Posted on Wednesday, August 04, 2004

Would you believe that only ONE shop in all of the Upper Valley carries Yakima Rack parts? Everyone else carries Thule, an inferior solution! To top it off, they didn't even have the part I was looking for (WindJammer)!
